content:
Snack

The image is a snack featuring a cup of coffee with a piece of cheese inside, which is a traditional Scandinavian way of enjoying coffee, known as "kaffeost."

Here's a table with a brief description and the numbered column:

| # | Ingredient | FODMAP Content | Specific FODMAP |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Coffee | Low FODMAP (in moderate servings) | Caffeine may cause gut sensitivity in some individuals |
| 2 | Cheese (e.g., hard cheese like Gouda or Cheddar) | Low FODMAP (in moderate servings) | Lactose (in larger servings or for specific types of cheese) |

Please note that individual tolerance to FODMAPs can vary. Pay attention to how your body reacts to different ingredients and adjust your diet accordingly. The FODMAP content of cheese may vary depending on the specific type used, so it's essential to be mindful of your personal tolerances.
